<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Empty Inside](/Spells.aspx?ID=2401)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 268

**Domain**
[Nothingness](/Domains.aspx?ID=114)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You inject a sliver of the void into your mind, momentarily remaking it into a bleak and empty place. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=3280) check against one [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590) effect affecting you.

---
**Heightened (5th)** You can attempt counteract checks against any number of emotion effects affecting you.
name: Empty Inside
